article_title: Obama-backing Harvard doc nominated as surgeon general
article_text:
WASHINGTON — President Obama is nominating a Harvard Medical School physician and medical activist as the nation’s next surgeon general.

Dr. Vivek Hallegere Murthy is co-founder and president of Doctors for America, an organization that says its mission is to ensure that everyone has access to affordable, high quality health care. He also started a nonprofit that focused on HIV/AIDS education in India and the United States.

article_summary:
WASHINGTON — President Obama is nominating a Harvard Medical School physician and medical activist as the nation’s next surgeon general.
He also started a nonprofit that focused on HIV/AIDS education in India and the United States.
Dr. Vivek Hallegere Murthy is co-founder and president of Doctors for America, an organization that says its mission is to ensure that everyone has access to affordable, high quality health care.
